title: Kuhusu bhirusi bhya Kud’a
licenseNotes: Manya usaaku’anya mandishi aya yandikiilwe, amû ukud’uuna kuitafusiri, kuyaabîpa na kuigheghela aka balîî balî, na uik’iise wadûûni amû isaa b’yaashara. Laazima okood’e hakimiliki na muamana ya mwaandiki na mochori Weiman Kou.
credits: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow
summary: This book gives basic advice on dealing with the coronavirus COVID 19

12.mlk: Kuna jai mooza ipeeka upejikeene kui’elewa kuhusu aka bhirusi bhya kud’a
12.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

13.mlk: Kuna jai mooza ipeeka upejikeene kui’elewa kuhusu aka bhirusi bhya kud’a
13.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

30.mlk: Kaag hatua. Mita 2 ikud’uuna kukweeka usalaama na mata/ikololo yat’innkie.
30.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m to 0.5m will keep you safe from large droplets.

31.mlk: Kaag hatua. Mita 2 ikud’uuna kukweeka usalaama na mata/ikololo yat’innkie.
31.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m to 0.5m will keep you safe from large droplets.

38.mlk: Kwa aka iyyo guya oone mûûdû akokololee/hat’iseeni
38.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

39.mlk: Kwa aka iyyo guya oone mûûdû akokololee/hat’iseeni
39.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

40.mlk: Wanyiige kyiizi.  Wakokololela dhini ama kuhat’isîza dhini na wakiinge waalya chwee waa bira yaao
40.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby

41.mlk: Wanyiige kyiizi.  Wakokololela dhini ama kuhat’isîza dhini na wakiinge waalya chwee waa bira yaao
41.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby

48.mlk: Anaafi daa moroghoti, nijai akukingee mîîlî
48.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

49.mlk: Anaafi daa moroghoti, nijai akukingee mîîlî
49.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

50.mlk: Waad waalya wa’ambukizizwe wakud’una kochowa konyisa d’alili, amû yiite wanaa maambukizi
50.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

51.mlk: Waad waalya wa’ambukizizwe wakud’una kochowa konyisa d’alili, amû yiite wanaa maambukizi
51.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

52.mlk: Na kwa uj’umula, ni fai kukaagî kla na ummati wa waadû, maana da’ukud’uuna kumanya katî kaao ni ani yûû moroghoti.
52.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

53.mlk: Na kwa uj’umula, ni fai kukaagî kla na ummati wa waadû, maana da’ukud’uuna kumanya katî kaao ni ani yûû moroghoti.
53.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

68.mlk: Na hata na b’atiini ya oso wa  kyiizi kyewwe
68.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

69.mlk: Na hata na b’atiini ya oso wa  kyiizi kyewwe
69.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

80.mlk: J’apokuwa wakati ûgî mataa mûûdû moroghoti yakud’uuna kut’innik’îla biyya zîgî…
80.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

81.mlk: J’apokuwa wakati ûgî mataa mûûdû moroghoti yakud’uuna kut’innik’îla biyya zîgî…
81.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

88.mlk: Na guya udhaabhi b’llaa kutarazia b’aadhyaa sehemu îzi, na kisaana ukadhaabha oso wewwe,
88.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

89.mlk: Na guya udhaabhi b’llaa kutarazia b’aadhyaa sehemu îzi, na kisaana ukadhaabha oso wewwe,
89.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

90.mlk: Na gîla mooza muhimu hamu ya kuwamala ni kwa koosa na kuwacheeja na sab’uni, jiiki, ama boorte.
90.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

91.mlk: Na gîla mooza muhimu hamu ya kuwamala ni kwa koosa na kuwacheeja na sab’uni, jiiki, ama boorte.
91.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

92.mlk: Bhirusi nijai bhikakaagî hubhîîni kwa mud’aa masa’a bhit’ook’o
92.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

93.mlk: Bhirusi nijai bhikakaagî hubhîîni kwa mud’aa masa’a bhit’ook’o
93.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

98.mlk: Dûû manaa yûû muhimu kweera aya
98.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

99.mlk: Dûû manaa yûû muhimu kweera aya
99.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

100.en: wash with soap up to here

101.en: wash with soap up to here

106.mlk: Manya usaadhaabha oso wewwe. (ama oso wa mûûdû ûgî.) Guya yaakukub’idhi, osa nguzi mikono yewwe aka fai na sab’uni.
106.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

107.mlk: Manya usaadhaabha oso wewwe. (ama oso wa mûûdû ûgî.) Guya yaakukub’idhi, osa nguzi mikono yewwe aka fai na sab’uni.
107.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

108.mlk: Mud’a mufai wa koghoona ubhinaa ‘Sikwaa kubhyaalîka’ mara bîlî.
108.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

109.mlk: Mud’a mufai wa koghoona ubhinaa ‘Sikwaa kubhyaalîka’ mara bîlî.
109.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

116.en: wash the back of your hands

117.en: wash the back of your hands

120.mlk: Guya ugheghezie aka iyyo, uswiite na wasiwasi. Ukisaana osa mikono yewwe na sab’uni.
120.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

121.mlk: Guya ugheghezie aka iyyo, uswiite na wasiwasi. Ukisaana osa mikono yewwe na sab’uni.
121.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

122.mlk: Manya usaadhaabha kyiizi ikyo na b’atiini.
122.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

123.mlk: Manya usaadhaabha kyiizi ikyo na b’atiini.
123.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

126.mlk: *Bakiteria nijai zika’enea kyiizi ikyo dhini guya ukifaazie kyiizi ikyo kwa mud’a mulaila
126.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

127.mlk: *Bakiteria nijai zika’enea kyiizi ikyo dhini guya ukifaazie kyiizi ikyo kwa mud’a mulaila
127.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

128.mlk: Llacha kyiizi guya oone kit’uraawie. Manya usaakufaala kyiizi ikyo zaid’yaa siku mooza!
128.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

129.mlk: Llacha kyiizi guya oone kit’uraawie. Manya usaakufaala kyiizi ikyo zaid’yaa siku mooza!
129.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

138.mlk: Killaa mûûdû ipejikeene akwiita na taulwaa koowa yeyye mweenye.

139.mlk: Killaa mûûdû ipejikeene akwiita na taulwaa koowa yeyye mweenye.

140.mlk: Manya musaakulubhana ama kutumika wali bhiitû, hubhî, bhikombe, taulu.
140.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

141.mlk: Manya musaakulubhana ama kutumika wali bhiitû, hubhî, bhikombe, taulu.
141.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

142.mlk: Maana da’ud’uuna udhaabhe oso wewwe na chik’ilî hata guya uwakud’eema
142.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

143.mlk: Maana da’ud’uuna udhaabhe oso wewwe na chik’ilî hata guya uwakud’eema
143.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

144.mlk: Guya iwakud’unikana arhûlla na ufuuge babala ikiwa utumikee ch’ik’ilî yewwe ama ifuzi lyewwe bad’ilyaa kutumika mokono wewwe.
144.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

145.mlk: Guya iwakud’unikana arhûlla na ufuuge babala ikiwa utumikee ch’ik’ilî yewwe ama ifuzi lyewwe bad’ilyaa kutumika mokono wewwe.
145.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

148.mlk: Na hata ba’ad’a kwiita b’atiini na wadûû
148.en: and after being out in the public

149.mlk: Na hata ba’ad’a kwiita b’atiini na wadûû
149.en: and after being out in the public

152.mlk: Osa mikono yewwe na maazî na sab’uni killaa wakati…
152.en: Always wash your hands with soap…

153.mlk: Osa mikono yewwe na maazî na sab’uni killaa wakati…
153.en: Always wash your hands with soap…

158.mlk: Killaa mûûdû na akaagî  na usalaama!

159.mlk: Killaa mûûdû na akaagî  na usalaama!

160.mlk: Killaa mûûdû na akaagî  na usalaama!

161.mlk: Killaa mûûdû na akaagî  na usalaama!

164.mlk: Soma nakala îyî ud’ak’abhe kumanya udhiina
164.en: Read the articles for more tips!
